name: internuclear

physics
  specialized between the nuclei (= the central parts) of atoms: internuclear space The molecule is symmetrical about the mid-point of the internuclear axis.
biology
  specialized between the nuclei of cells (= the parts that control their growth): internuclear fibres internuclear migration of proteins Related word
nucleus
More examplesFewer examplesIt is necessary to take into account the inter-nuclear repulsion and the interactions between the electrons and the nuclei.The positional uncertainty is significantly smaller than the internuclear distance.All the quantities depend on the internuclear separation as a parameter.
